sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_b632d5824f103300ad404a10a310c7ff
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Assistem Test - UI Policy</name><record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[(function(){
	var uip = new GlideRecord('sys_ui_policy');
	uip.setLimit(1);
	uip.addQuery('sys_id','66f94c730a0a0b0900aaaf5b88527230');
	uip.query();

	while (uip.next()) {
		var cond = uip.getValue('conditions');
		//incident_state=7^ORincident_state=8^EQ
		//category=inquiry^ORcategory=software^NQsubcategory=antivirus
		//category=inquiry^ORcategory=software^active=true^NQsubcategory=antivirus
		var wa = cond.split('^NQ');
		for (var a in wa) {
			var wb = wa[a].split(/\^(?!OR)/);
			for (var b in wb) {
				var wc = wb[b].split('^OR');
				for (var c in wc) {
					gs.log('100 wc[c]: ' + wc[c], 'TDDB');
				}
			}
		}
	}
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>tim_deniston</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-03-21 12:10:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>b632d5824f103300ad404a10a310c7ff</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Assistem Test - UI Policy</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b632d5824f103300ad404a10a310c7ff</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>tim_deniston</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-03-21 12:52:54</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>
